The rankings of Wisconsin: s health care quality in the Milwaukee Journal Sentinel articles from June 19, 2011, June 12, 2007, December 11, 2011, April 29, 2011, and October 7, 2014 were examined to verify the claim.
The Commonwealth Fund: s Scorecard on state health system performance from 2014 was referenced to assess Wisconsin's health care quality ranking.
Email exchanges with Stacy Day: the Regional press secretary for Scott Walker, and Ernest Moy, the Medical officer for quality improvement and patient safety at the Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality, were conducted to obtain additional verification on the claim.
